title: Can we do extra hackerrank problems in the college account itself or should I create a new hackerrank account for solving at home

comments.body:
College account? What? 

Were you required to do a few problems for your assignment or something? If that's true you should ask the respective teacher once. (Just in case they have some stupid evaluation criteria)


If it was not for an assignment, do whatever you want. Hackerrank and all other similar websites are primarily for practice and learning. It doesn't matter which account you use as long as you do it.

College account as in, they asked us to create an account with our srn as the username. And we had to solve problems in python lab

So I wasn't sure if I can use that same account for extra problems at home

>It doesn't matter which account you use as long as you do it.

Okay thanks :)
Ok if you are doing it for lab, I'd strongly encourage you to ask the lab teacher and the regular comp teacher.
